EmailTemplate.name: PG Evening invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: PG Evening Invitation test
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
So.. Apparently systems are like dictators..
Hell yeah we are! Lately I find myself holding a Cuban cigar and a glass of whisky like a true dictator does! I even got a white hamster to stroke because cats as evil partners are so last decade..
So you would be wise to not underestimate Carlos "Ricky" el Diablo (yes, of course its a viable name for a hamster!!) he knows kung-fu and is excellent at nibbling on ankles of my enemies.. muahahaha!
That's right, I even have an evil laugh! What? You don't think it's very original? Not creative enough? Well.. No one asked you!
Now you're thinking.. "Damn, Maks has all of those cool dictatory stuff, but he doesnt have a secret hideout!" and you are wrong! Mua-Ha-Ha-Haaa.. ( Im getting better at this)
Well, for your information I have a very secret base at the bottom of the Atlantic ocean at N 39Â° 54' 35.0504"! It has a massive aquarium with nine thousand nine hundred and ninety-nine Goldfish swimming in circles! It's probably the most beautiful place on earth but you will never find it because its secret and I would never tell you where it was!
-End of message-
*This email will auto-destruct in 6minutes and 32seconds*
